Strong relationship:
    precision-fmeasure (all samples)
    loc-files (all samples)
    files-performance (classic vector, neural network, extended boolean, BM25)
    precision-recall (extended boolean)

Moderate relationship:
    files-performance (all methods, LSI)
    recall-fmeasure (classic vector, neural network, BM25)
    totaltraces-precision (*negative* | all methods, classic vector, BM25)
    features-precision (classic vector, extended boolean)
    precision-recall (neural network, BM25)
